com.pi4j.io.gpio

Interface GpioPinDigitalMultipurpose

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GpioPin, GpioPinDigital, GpioPinDigitalInput, GpioPinDigitalOutput, GpioPinInput, GpioPinOutput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GpioPinImpl

    public interface GpioPinDigitalMultipurpose
extends GpioPinDigitalInput, GpioPinDigitalOutput
    Gpio digital pin interface. This interface is extension of GpioPin interface with operation to read digital states.
    Author:
    Robert Savage (http://www.savagehomeautomation.com)
